topic: North Korea nuclear test status Jan 2026
summary: NK last tested Sept 2017 (8+ years ago). Tunnel No. 3 at Punggye-ri ready since 2020 but no imminent test signs as of Nov 2025 satellite imagery. Trump dropped denuclearization goal, diplomatic window open. Kim focused on missile production, not nuclear testing.
content: Key facts: 1) Last NK nuclear test was Sept 3, 2017. World has gone 8+ years without a nuclear test - a record. 2) Tunnel No. 3 at Punggye-ri has been ready since ~2020. Both US and South Korea assess preparations are complete. 3) Nov 2025 satellite imagery shows NO signs of imminent test - no instruments, power lines, cables detected. 4) Trump dropped denuclearization from national security strategy Dec 2025, hinting at diplomatic engagement. 5) Kim focused on missile testing and production expansion. 6) North Korea-Russia partnership providing benefits. 7) Kim planning party congress to unveil nuclear force plans. 8) Base rate: 6 tests in ~225 months = 2.7%/month, but misleading given 8-year gap.
